name: AoT: Maneuvering Experience
description:
Hey! I'm Angga and I'm just a kid that making game on the Internet, anyway, this project first called Beans on Titan but it was wierd, then I changed it up to AoT : Manuvering Experience. why ? because in this game, you have no enemy and just flying around the map with Anti Personnel Gear.

In the next update i will added another things like Gun Mechanic or Dummy for you to shot with the APG
